attributes.action: Urge the BBC to host a Science & Technology award scheme similar to that of the Sports personality award
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recent years, the areas of Science & Technology has been shunned from the spot-light by the arts and sport regarding awards and recognition. This petition urges the government/bbc to acknowledge the science & technology achievements that this country produces to a high standard world-wide.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
